name: Scary Horror Funtime Escape
description:
Did you like Adventure Survival Games ? Then this amazing Horror Scary Game will give you and extra enjoyment in the scary house. You have forget your thing in the house go and Get all your things. before the horror Catches you. You have to stay silent so he can't listen to you. He is very clever so be ready to escape from him.
Features
-Amazing Horror House
-Chapter wise Gameplay
-Sound Effects
